Package com.redis.app.redis_app_studio.shared

Class DataLoader

java.lang.Object
com.redis.app.redis_app_studio.shared.DataLoader
public class DataLoader extends Object
The Data loader is responsible to loading data files from the filesystem, establishing Redis connections and bootstrapping the databases with data. In addition, it will assign connection resources to the application context object.

  • Method Details

    • deriveStoragePathFileName

      public String deriveStoragePathFileName(String aPathName, String aFileName)
      Derives the storage path file name from the current web server file system configuration.
      Parameters:
      aPathName - Path name where CSV folder file resides
      aFileName - File name of the CSV file
      Returns:
      Complete storage path/file name

    • isDataHierarchyJSON

      public boolean isDataHierarchyJSON(String aStructure, String aDSTitle) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException, IOException
      Since hierarchy files can have multiple types (JSON, graph), this method determines if the data set identified by the data source title is JSON related.
      Parameters:
      aStructure - Data structure
      aDSTitle - Data source title
      Returns:
      true if the data files are for JSON and false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source exception
      IOException - I/O exception

    • isDataHierarchyAGraph

      public boolean isDataHierarchyAGraph(String aStructure, String aDSTitle) throws com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException, IOException
      Since hierarchy files can have multiple types (JSON, graph), this method determines if the data set identified by the data source title is a graph.
      Parameters:
      aStructure - Data structure
      aDSTitle - Data source title
      Returns:
      true if the data files are for a graph and false otherwise
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source exception
      IOException - I/O exception

    • getGridDSFromStorageFile

      public com.redis.ds.ds_grid.GridDS getGridDSFromStorageFile(String aStructure, String aDSTitle) throws IOException, com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException, ParserConfigurationException, SAXException
      Redis App Studio uses a simple CSV file to track its list of supported data and schema files. This method will locate those files (by type and title) and load them into an in-memory grid data source.
      Parameters:
      aStructure - Data structure ('flat' or 'hierarchy')
      aDSTitle - Data source title
      Returns:
      Grid data source instance
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O exception processing data file
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source configuration error
      ParserConfigurationException - Schema file parsing error
      SAXException - Schema file parsing error

    • loadReleaseGridFromFileSystem

      public com.redis.ds.ds_grid.GridDS loadReleaseGridFromFileSystem() throws IOException, com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      This method loads an in-memory grid of release history information.
      Returns:
      Grid data source instance
      Throws:
      IOException - I/O exception processing data file
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source configuration error

      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      com.redis.ds.ds_redis.RedisDSException

      Returns:
      Grid data source instance
      Throws:
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source exception
